# PROTOTYPE.md

## Brief description
Explain why this PR includes a prototype or mock and what it stands in for.

## Reason for prototype
Why a real implementation isn't provided yet (e.g., missing hardware, external dependency, high effort, experimenting).

## Acceptance criteria / tests
List tests and expected behavior that validate this prototype is acceptable for now.

## Replacement plan
Link or create an issue tracking replacement work and include an approximate timeline.

## Owner
Who will track and own the replacement work.
